title: Showcase your style with new Chroma Packs

replies.body: An entire colour spectrum that you could use but you gave Zac two yellow skins?

i cant believe you are the only person to say this, i personally love riots ideas...usually. but in a pack that you are  required to receive all three chromas... i think it is a bit rough to have yellow zac and slightly orangey yellow zac in one pac. red, aquamarine, frigging anything except two of the SAME THING in one bundle. bad show. but as i said, usually i like their angles. but chromas were a big loss in my opinion, and originally i did think "at least zac gets a little love" but it was weak in the end.
It is not out yet in store, 4:40 a.m. in Melbourne.
Sorry about that, they are now in the store under the "Bundles" tab.
darius is missing http://i.imgur.com/aPvLmOo.png
Darius has been temporarily disabled due to an in-store bug.
So basically it is a dye pack like in blizzards "heroes of the storm" It is nice to be able to have this but don't pretend the idea is original.
Yeah but as much as you try to get into HoTS it will still be a slow crappy version of LoL that makes you rely on complete idiots you have never met (who don't understand moba) to win a match
lol sit down mistress
do a varus chromo pack {{champion:110}}

Why does it say 590RP each and then in the store they cost 3x that? I would of bought them all for 590 lol, why you always gotta be so disappointingly expensive rito.
It is because you do not own the champ the chroma pack is for they are just offering you to buy both in a bundle. If you own the champ it is 590RP.
But I do own the champ, apparently you have to own the champ AND the skin and then it is 590 just for the skin colours, which is just a terrible deal imo.
